TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MissingValueIndicatorTransformer extends Microsoft.ML.Data.OneToOneTransformerBase
Public NotInheritable Class MissingValueIndicatorTransformer Inherits OneToOneTransformerBase

member.name: NAIndicator
member.summary: This transform can transform either scalars or vectors (both fixed and variable size), creating output columns that indicate, through the true/false booleans whether the row has a missing value.
